text:
Hi {{ UserName }},

 Welcome to Operation Code! I'm a bot designed to help answer questions and get you on your way in our community.

\Please take a moment to review our <https://op.co.de/code-of-conduct|Code of Conduct.>

Our goal here at Operation Code is to get veterans and their families started on the path to a career in programming. We do that through providing you with scholarships, mentoring, career development opportunities, conference tickets, and more!

You're currently in Slack, a chat application that serves as the hub of Operation Code. If you're currently visiting us via your browser, Slack provides a stand alone program to make staying in touch even more convenient. You can download it <https://slack.com/downloads|here.>

Want to make your first change to a program right now? All active Operation Code Projects are located on our source control repository. Our projects can be viewed on <https://github.com/OperationCode/START_HERE|Github.>
